name: can you help me with a dnd scenario

speech: I can help you with a DnD campaign/adventure/scenario. Although, right now, all I can do is provide you with a copy of the guidebooks. Make sure somebody in the group has a full set of DnD dies, as they are required for creating a campaign. Would you like a copy of the books?
Yes. All I can do, however, is send you a copy of the guidebooks. Make sure that someone in your group has a full set of DnD dies. Now, would you like a copy of the books?
